about_the_game:
A Rougelike, Deck-building, and Team-building Space Road Movie!

Players will take on the role of Bandit Carl, a nameless space pirate captain, caught in a power struggle and trapped in a endless loop within a reality show simulator called Eden. As the only conscious being in the simulation, you must recruit crew members, upgrade your ship, and fight alongside your team. Navigate through uniquely styled universes, overcome challenges to ensure your survival!

A Fantasy World and an Absurd Reality Show

In this world, a world full of oddities, colors, and childlike wonder, lies a fantasy universe that stretches across six major regions. A pirate finds themselves accidentally trapped in a reality show simulator called Eden, becoming a pawn on the playground of powerful figures. The reality show simulates the various regions of this fantasy universe. Along the way, players will meet all kinds of unique companions — a eagle pilot who cannot fly, a clumsy cactus, a theater-loving orc, and a jellyfish with an exposed mind...

Form Your Ultimate Spaceship Crew

Players will build their own super spaceship team by assembling suitable crew members and ship compartments. This team will inject limitless strategic possibilities into your deck. As the spaceship upgrades and the team grows, the crew and ship compartments will collectively form your battle deck, helping you stand out in intense combat.

Strategic Card Battles

This game integrates a tactical grid system with priority mechanics, delivering a multi-dimensional strategic battle experience. Players must skillfully command, effectively utilize their cards and team abilities, and devise tactics to exploit the weaknesses of various enemies to achieve victories.

Thrilling First-Person Combat

Inside the spaceship cockpit, players command their fleet to battle against a variety of bizarre enemies. Observed the battlefield directly through the window and utilize the spaceship's HUD for combat assistance, delivering heart-pounding battle experience!
